column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We had a great experience at Jinya Ramen Bar which seems to be a great place and price for ramen bowels in Houston. We went with a group of 5 on New Years Day and expectedly there was about a one hour wait. Their indoor waiting area is limited and due to the cold weather everyone was crowded inside but the hosts and waitstaff were still well organized
column3: and had good communication. We were seated as quickly as possible for a busy day.
